title: Large, classic 1 bedroom at Windsor Arms (202)!
map_address: 532 Belmont Ave E near Belmont and Mercer
posting_body: Spacious 1 bedroom apartment at The Windsor Arms.

This classic and charming brick building is perfectly situated in Capitol Hill – tucked away on a quiet, residential quarter of this urban neighborhood, but within an easy stroll to all the offerings on Broadway and beyond, including grocery stores, gyms, library, parks, and an array of restaurants, bars, cafes, and boutiques.
Spacious kitchen with ample cabinet space
Windows are north and west facing
Reasonable flat fee for utilities: $75 (second occupant fee of $35) (Water, sewer, garbage, and hot water)
The building offers on-site laundry (with convenient pay-by-phone feature), parking (based on availability), bike storage, and remote intercom entry.
Text or email to schedule a tour.
